Description: Particulate matter < 1 micrometer in aerosol diameter

Description: Particulate matter < 2.5 micrometers in aerosol diameter

Description: Particulate matter < 10 micrometers in aerosol diameter

Label: ``O3``
Notes: AQS standard is parts per million

Notes: verify with performance target report recommendation

Notes: verify with performance target report recommendation

Label: ``DP`` *
Notes: *If internal Temp and RH measured, but not DP, DP is calculated via the Dewpoint() module and is labeled 'DP_calculated'

Label: ``[param name]_Normalized``
Description: Parameter data normalized by corresponding reference
